post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Details
Dexterra Sybex Mobile Developer
Toronto, ON
Date Posted: March 17, 2010
Job ID: 11851        

Job Description

Our Bay Street client is currently seeking one (1) Dexterra / AMT-Sybex Mobile Application Developer. This is a contract opportunity slated to begin in April, and is projected to be one (1) year in length.

Key Responsibilities

The successful candidate will be responsible for:

Assisting the line of business in developing mobile applications using the new enterprise mobile solution;
Reporting to the Project Manager for the Mobile IT projects, this position will translate the business requirements from the business primes and will convert them into design documents; and,
Developing mobile applications that are fully integrated with the enterprise service bus.
Skills and Qualifications

The qualified candidate must have:

Six plus (6+) years of technical experience in an IT environment as a Business Analyst and Developer;
An understanding of the system development lifecycle policies and procedures;
A demonstrated ability to communicate and document design of solutions;
The ability to work in a diversified environment with little supervision and meet tight deadlines;
Experience with the following technologies:
Java
Visual Studio
VB.Net and/or C#
Microsoft SQL Server
WebServices / BEA service bus;
Knowledge of the Dexterra and/or AMT-Sybex tool kit is an asset; and,
Knowledge of SAP integration is also an asset.
Don't miss out on this opportunity, apply on-line today!

We thank all applicants for their interest; however, only candidates under consideration will be contacted.  Please note that your application does not signify the beginning of employment with Eagle and that employment with Eagle will only commence when placed on an assignment as a temporary employee of Eagle.
post.title: Dexterra Sybex Mobile Developer-Eagle Professional
